name: Notion Job Applications Tracker
description: Plan your career. Track with ease.With this Notion template you can stay up to date on all the applications to jobs you have made. Easily perfect your application with tools and resources to help you stand out.Features:Application trackerUpcoming interview/application deadline previewEmail templatesUseful websitesInterview preparationIncludes 200 UK based companies you can apply to
features: Application tracker; Upcoming interview/application deadline preview; Email templates; Useful websites; Interview preparation; Includes 200 UK based companies you can apply to
